name: Navratna Udupi Pure Veg Family Restaurant

reviews.review_text: The food was very okaish. Thr waiters were very rude and non cooperating. We ordered idli, dosa and vada. We asked for a combo of idli vada but they denied that. We saw the combo present on the menu later and the waiter refused to change it. Worst experience. Just wanted to grab more money from the customers.

Worst experience! Waiters are unprofessional and are scamming you! If you end up here and which I won't recommend, please check the menu before you order.
My experience: I asked whether he has an idly and wada combo - he answered no, I have to order separately. So I ordered. Later when I checked the menu it clearly said there were multiple combos but he wanted us to order separately so that he could earn that chiller!

Later when we confronted the waiter he said it was our fault that we didn't check the menu!! We were like wow!! Dude are you serious??

Don't ever visit this place!!

I ordered biriyani here but it was very bad. To be honest, I was not even going to eat it. And vegetables were also added in it. Without cleaning them and the flavour was coming out as is. I am not recommend this place.
